description:
While the rest of the Straw Hats continue to fight bravely, Luffy tries to find a way to save the island, and the horrible truth about Hordy`s hatred for humans is finally revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Shocking Fact! The True Identity of Hordy!
La vérité éclate ! Le véritable Hody
Shougeki no Jijitsu! Hody no Shoutai!
衝撃の事実! ホーディの正体!
